solution_line_template: Each week, they watch {episodes_monday} Monday + {episodes_wednesday} Wednesday episodes = <<{episodes_monday}+{episodes_wednesday}={episodes_per_week}>>{episodes_per_week} episodes a week.
If you take {total_episodes} total episodes / {episodes_per_week} episodes each week = <<{total_episodes}/{episodes_per_week}={weeks_to_watch}>>{weeks_to_watch} weeks to watch The Office series.
